qa.name: Amelia Haunt
qa.appearance: Translucent with a soft blue glow

json_to_edit.voice_over: In death, we seek the truth that eluded us in life.
json_to_edit.description: Ghost Amelia investigates an abandoned mansion for clues about her past.
json_to_edit.name: Spectral Investigation
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Ghost Amelia explores an abandoned mansion, searching for answers about her mysterious death.

qa.action: A fog-shrouded Victorian mansion looms in the moonlight, its windows dark and forbidding.

hf.action: Amelia's translucent form glides through the front door, her soft blue glow illuminating the dusty foyer.

tr.action: Amelia examines old photographs on a cobweb-covered mantelpiece, her ethereal fingers barely touching the frames.

xc.action: Amelia's eyes widen as she recognizes herself in one of the photographs, memories flooding back.

ka.action: The camera follows Amelia as she floats up the grand staircase, her form flickering with each step.

fn.action: Through Amelia's eyes, we see a dusty bedroom with a century-old crime scene outline on the floor.

af.action: Amelia discovers a hidden letter in a secret compartment of an old desk, revealing clues about her murder.

qo.action: Amelia's ghost becomes more vibrant as she uncovers the truth, the room around her coming to life with spectral energy.

edit_command: Expand the scene by adding three new shots that show Amelia encountering other ghosts who help her piece together the mystery of her death.

updated_json.voice_over: In death, we seek the truth that eluded us in life.
updated_json.description: Ghost Amelia investigates an abandoned mansion for clues about her past, encountering other spirits who aid her quest.
updated_json.name: Spectral Investigation
updated_json.scene_summary: Ghost Amelia explores an abandoned mansion, searching for answers about her mysterious death. She encounters other ghosts who help her uncover the truth.

qa.action: A fog-shrouded Victorian mansion looms in the moonlight, its windows dark and forbidding.

hf.action: Amelia's translucent form glides through the front door, her soft blue glow illuminating the dusty foyer.

tr.action: Amelia examines old photographs on a cobweb-covered mantelpiece, her ethereal fingers barely touching the frames.

xc.action: Amelia's eyes widen as she recognizes herself in one of the photographs, memories flooding back.

ka.action: The camera follows Amelia as she floats up the grand staircase, her form flickering with each step.

fn.action: Through Amelia's eyes, we see a dusty bedroom with a century-old crime scene outline on the floor.

af.action: Amelia discovers a hidden letter in a secret compartment of an old desk, revealing clues about her murder.

qo.action: Amelia's ghost becomes more vibrant as she uncovers the truth, the room around her coming to life with spectral energy.

bx.action: A ghostly butler materializes, pointing Amelia towards a hidden passage behind a bookshelf.

yz.action: Amelia follows the spectral butler through the passage, encountering fleeting images of past events related to her death.

lm.action: In a secret room, Amelia meets a council of ghosts who reveal the final pieces of her death's puzzle through a haunting reenactment.

label.rationale: we can expand the scene by adding three new shots that show amelia encountering other ghosts who help her piece together the mystery of her death. this will add depth to the story and provide more context for amelia's investigation. we'll add these shots after the existing ones, maintaining the flow of the narrative. we'll update the number_of_shots from "8" to "11" to reflect the addition of three new shots. we'll also need to update the list_display_order to include the new shots and add their details to the shots dictionary.
